name: Anun Membrane Gloves
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ *** Only Bureaucrats and Traders can use these gloves. Since the tradeskill process creates a nondrop item, the user must do it him/herself. Basic ingredient for gloves are Anun Wings. They drop of any Anun mob, for higher quality I would suggest hunting Anuns in PW or inside missions. You'll also need Mass Relocating Robot (Shape Soft Armor) to complete the process. *** #L "Anun Wing" "248930" #L "Mass Relocating Robot (Shape Soft Armor)" "162220" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Anun Wing + Mass Relocating Robot (Shape Soft Armor) = #L "Anun Membrane Gloves" "248928" Skills: | requires 3.5 QL in Mech. Engi |
